data-uia="https://assets.nflxext.com/web/ffe/wp/@nf-web-ui/ui-shared/dist/signup/simplicity/simpleSignupClient.js" crossorigin="anonymous" integrity="sha512-oRnM92OEJfJKv+bZoBM0eQpN/5h3gNOS79E6ziNChci3pdTNpoRLlqKfheSRP5S15nFVRBRroeyJ6GCgqdGmRA=="></script><script>
        var allScriptTags = document.getElementsByTagName('script');
        for (var i = 0; i < allScriptTags.length; i++) {
            allScriptTags[i].onerror = function (event) {
                var payload = {
                    script: event.target.outerHTML,
                    src: event.target.src,
                    timeStamp: event.timeStamp,
                    name: event.target.getAttribute('data-uia'),
                    cluster: "nq_website_nonmember-prod-release"
                }
                try {
                    fetch('/script-error', {
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: {
                            'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(payload),
                    });
                } catch (e) {}
            }
        }
    </script></div><script>
if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations) {
    navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then(function(registrations) {
        if (registrations) {
            registrations.forEach(function (registration) {
                registration.unregister().catch(function () {});
            });
        }
    }).catch(function () {});
}
</script></body></html>
